MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh, affecting properties in East King Street and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to assess and carry out repairs to a damaged substation we  needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:51pm on Wednesday, 28 April 2021
